description: RARELY AVAILABLE and highly desirable LAKE FRONT end unit in Boundary Park, offering the largest outdoor area in the complex. This stunning home features a new retaining wall, fence, and a private side deck leading to an east-facing yard and patio overlooking Boundary Park Lake. The spacious Primary Bedroom is conveniently located on the main floor (currently used as a family room) with ensuite. Enjoy the bright living/dining area with hardwood floors, vaulted ceilings, skylights, and a gas fireplace. The beautifully updated kitchen boasts new white shaker cabinets, quartz countertops, a gas stove, and stainless-steel appliances. Upstairs, find two large bedrooms (one with a Murphy bed) and laundry facilities. Additional perks include a double garage & driveway. Pet-friendly! MUST SEE!
